title: AI CRM Proposal
description: Act like a pro business consultant. Create a persuasive, data-driven proposal for Tech Enterprise to pitch an AI-powered CRM, including executive summary, ROI projections, and an implementation roadmap; output as PPTX.
prompt:
<prompt>
  <title>AI CRM Proposal</title>
  <role>Act like a pro business consultant</role>
  <task>Create a persuasive proposal for the client</task>

  <request>
    <task>WriteProposal</task>
    <client>Tech Enterprise</client>
    <goal>Pitch AI-powered CRM</goal>
    <deliverables>
      <item>Executive summary</item>
      <item>ROI projections</item>
      <item>Implementation roadmap</item>
    </deliverables>
    <tone>Persuasive and data-driven</tone>
    <output format="pptx"/>
  </request>
</prompt>
